Pre-Game Insights: Argentina is looking to become the tournament’s historic champion with a record-breaking 16 wins.
Colombia only has one Copa America win from 2001.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will take place on Sunday, July 14, 2024, at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida.
Colombia defeated Uruguay in the semifinal with a 1-0 victory, extending their 28-game streak.
Julián Álvarez scored for Argentina in their semifinal against Canada.
Lionel Messi scored his first goal in the tournament, securing Argentina’s spot in the final.
Only resale tickets remain on platforms like Vivid Seats, SeatGeek, and StubHub, with prices at an all-time high for the final match.
